dcterms:creator: ISO/IEC JTC1/SC29/WG4
dcterms:description: A standard for volumetric video transmission that facilitates the storage and transmission of digital immersive media for playback with 6 degrees of freedom.
dcterms:title: MPEG Immersive Video (MIV)

dcterms:creator: J. Jung
B. Kroon
dcterms:description: Common test conditions that define constraints for pixel rate in immersive video applications.
dcterms:title: MIV Common Test Conditions (CTC)

dcterms:creator: B. Salahieh
B. Kroon
J. Jung
A. Dziembowski
dcterms:description: A test model for MPEG Immersive Video that provides a normative decoding process and a non-normative rendering process.
dcterms:title: TMIV

dcterms:creator: S. Fachada
D. Bonatto
A. Schenkel
G. Lafruit
dcterms:description: Methods for depth image-based view synthesis that utilize multiple reference views for virtual reality applications.
dcterms:title: Depth image-based rendering (DIBR) methods

dcterms:creator: B. Kroon
V. K. Malamal Vadakital
J. Jung
dcterms:description: Recommended pixel rate limits for the Common Test Conditions for Immersive Video, addressing hardware limitations.
dcterms:title: Recommended pixel rate limits for the CTC for Immersive Video
